verbose_text: Early studies show that inhibition of mTORC1 by S6K1 ablation as well as adipose specific deficiency of Raptor enhances thermogenesis and energy expenditure and protects against diet induced obesity and glucose intolerance.
evidence: mTORC1 by S6K1 ablation as well as adipose-specific deficiency of Raptor enhances thermogenesis and energy expenditure and protects against diet-induced obesity and glucose
